name: Furnacron
description: A massive mechanical furnace beast that burns with the heat of a thousand suns. Its steel armor is nearly impenetrable, and its fire attacks can melt through anything.

ability.name: Molten Core
ability.description: Fire attacks deal 50% more damage. When hit by physical attacks, attacker takes burn damage equal to 12.5% of damage dealt.

moves.name: Molten Hammer
moves.description: A devastating hammer strike that burns the target and may lower defense.

moves.name: Steel Beam
moves.description: Fires a concentrated steel beam. User takes recoil damage.

moves.name: Heat Wave
moves.description: Releases intense heat that may burn all enemies.

moves.name: Iron Defense
moves.description: Hardens steel body, sharply raising defense.

habitat: Ancient volcanic forges and steel foundries
